Package com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.state

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.state.Phase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Edit, ExecuteOrder, Gameover, IssueOrder, Reinforcement, SaveGame, Startup
public abstract class Phase extends Object implements Serializable
The phase class is abstract class whose duty is to implement all the command in game All the commands in game will be implementing by relevant phases by using methods of phase class
See Also:

      public abstract String assignCountries()

    • tournament

      public abstract String tournament(String p_String, String p_CommandStringFromInput)
      It is the tournament method of the game engine to play the game in tournament mode. It does this if the command is applicable for that particular phase or else it will simply return String stating invalid command
      Parameters:
      p_String - string input
      p_CommandStringFromInput - input entered by the user.
      Returns:
      Acknowledgement
